actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend th U.S. Housing Act of 1937 to remove the existing 15 percent limit on the amount of assistance which may be provided thereunder for low-rent public housing in any one State.

summary.text: Removes the existing 15 percent limit on the amount of assistance which may be provided thereunder for low-rent public housing in any one State under the United States Housing Act. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 1410(e))

titles.title: A bill to amend th U.S. Housing Act of 1937 to remove the existing 15 percent limit on the amount of assistance which may be provided thereunder for low-rent public housing in any one State.
